update.description:
* Change title of inertia parameters tutorial

* Put sentences and links on their own lines

* Update inertia tutorial with examples based on sphere meshes, eliminating duplicate faces, and extra explanation of inertia parameters

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=inertia&cat=build_robot&branch=inertia_scpeters

See 60fc826 for the bulk of the content changes. This adds new content and also fixes issue #49.

@alextoind
update.title: Update inertia tutorial

content.raw: Two approvals, but I'll give @chapulina a chance to respond to my comments
content.html: Two approvals, but I'll give @chapulina a chance to respond to my comments

content.raw: Blarg. Ignore this, looked at the wrong files.
content.html: Blarg. Ignore this, looked at the wrong files.

content.raw: Looks like I made some spacing mistakes in `Checking in Gazebo` section. Working on a solution now.
content.html: Looks like I made some spacing mistakes in Checking in Gazebo section. Working on a solution now.

content.raw: Oh has this ever worked? I've never been able to delete links during simulation. Maybe mention the model editor now?
content.html: Oh has this ever worked? I've never been able to delete links during simulation. Maybe mention the model editor now?

content.raw: Made some changes in the [inertia_nate](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/branch/inertia_nate?dest=inertia_scpeters#diff) branch.
content.html: Made some changes in the inertia_nate branch.

content.raw: The CoM visualization should help with debugging misplaced CoM?
content.html: The CoM visualization should help with debugging misplaced CoM?

content.raw: Should this image be under `Scaling to increase numerical precision`?
content.html: Should this image be under Scaling to increase numerical precision?

content.raw: Suggestion: break this into paragraphs or bullet points
content.html: Suggestion: break this into paragraphs or bullet points
